tool_description: Builds formatted performance reports from analytics data using customizable templates for different stakeholder audiences and reporting requirements.

report_type.description: Type of report: executive_summary, detailed_analysis, dashboard_summary, trend_report

data_sections.description: Data sections to include in report

target_audience.description: Intended report audience: executives, managers, analysts, stakeholders

time_period.description: Reporting period: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly

include_visualizations.description: Whether to include charts and graphs

error_messages: Invalid report type: Use one of [executive_summary, detailed_analysis, dashboard_summary, trend_report].
Empty data sections: data_sections array must contain at least one section.
Invalid target audience: Use one of [executives, managers, analysts, stakeholders].
Invalid time period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly].
Insufficient data: Not enough data provided in sections for report generation.
usage: Specify report_type and data_sections array, optionally set target_audience, time_period, and include_visualizations. Returns formatted report ready for distribution.

executive_summary.description: Key insights and executive summary section
